p: The hydroxyl value and acid value of the sample were determined according to ASTM S957-86 and ASTM D4662-03, respectively. The epoxy value of the sample was tested according to GB/T 1677-2008. The viscosity of the sample was determined based on ASTM D2983 using a rotary Viscometer DVS+ (Brookfield, Middleboro, MA, USA).
